trans-unit.source: <MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> Command Line Interfaces

seg-source.mrk: <MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> Command Line Interfaces

target.mrk: Interfaces de ligne de commande d'<MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

trans-unit.source: Two <MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> command line interfaces enable you to modify various parameters:

seg-source.mrk: Two <MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> command line interfaces enable you to modify various parameters:

target.mrk: Deux interfaces de ligne de commande pour <MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> permettent de modifier plusieurs paramètres :

trans-unit.source: ade_admin: Contains commands to manage the  and graphical interface from the command line interface.

seg-source.mrk: ade_admin: Contains commands to manage the  and graphical interface from the command line interface.

target.mrk: ade_admin : Contient des commandes pour gérer le et une interface graphique à partir de l'interface de ligne de commande.

alt-trans.seg-source: Contains commands to manage the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> and graphical interface from the command line interface.
alt-trans.target: Contient des commandes pour gérer le <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> et une interface graphique à partir de l'interface de ligne de commande.

trans-unit.source: ade_server: Contains commands concerning the and requires to stop the Atempo Dedup Engine service.

seg-source.mrk: ade_server: Contains commands concerning the and requires to stop the Atempo Dedup Engine service.

target.mrk: ade_server : Contient des commandes concernant le et nécessite d'arrêter le service Atempo Dedup Engine.

alt-trans.seg-source: Contains commands concerning the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> and requires to stop the Atempo Dedup Engine service.
alt-trans.target: Contient des commandes concernant le <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> et nécessite d'arrêter le service Atempo Dedup Engine.

trans-unit.source: Launching the ade_admin Interface

seg-source.mrk: Launching the ade_admin Interface

target.mrk: Lancer l’interface ade_admin

trans-unit.source: On the machine hosting the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />:

seg-source.mrk: On the machine hosting the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />:

target.mrk: Sur la machine qui héberge l'<MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> :

trans-unit.source: Windows Select Start > Programs >   > Administration.

seg-source.mrk: Windows Select Start > Programs >   > Administration.

target.mrk: Windows Sélectionnez Démarrer > Tous les programmes >   > Administration.

trans-unit.source: macOS/Linux Launch the ./ade_admin command.

seg-source.mrk: macOS/Linux Launch the ./ade_admin command.

target.mrk: macOS / Linux Exécutez la commande ./ade_admin.

trans-unit.source: Connect as superadmin. If you do not provide any login credentials, you will be logged as guest, in read-only mode.

seg-source.mrk: Connect as superadmin.
If you do not provide any login credentials, you will be logged as guest, in read-only mode.

target.mrk: Connectez-vous en tant que superadmin.
Si vous ne fournissez aucun identifiant, vous serez connecté en tant qu’invité, en mode lecture seule.

trans-unit.source: To launch the Command Line Interface with a different user, run the ./ade_admin -u username command. You are prompted to enter the password for this user.

seg-source.mrk: To launch the Command Line Interface with a different user, run the ./ade_admin -u username command.
You are prompted to enter the password for this user.

target.mrk: Pour lancer le mode commande avec un autre utilisateur, exécutez la commande ./ade_admin -u nom d'utilisateur.
Vous devez fournir le mot de passe de cet utilisateur.

trans-unit.source: To see help for more for more details about ade_admin commands, enter the following commands:

seg-source.mrk: To see help for more for more details about ade_admin commands, enter the following commands:

target.mrk: Pour consulter l'aide et obtenir plus de détails sur les commandes ade_admin, entrez les commandes suivantes :

trans-unit.source: root@semaphore:/DT/local/Dedup/Bin# ./ade_admin password: hyperstream:23232> help

seg-source.mrk: root@semaphore:/DT/local/Dedup/Bin# ./ade_admin
password:
hyperstream:23232> help

target.mrk: root@semaphore:/DT/local/Dedup/Bin# ./ade_admin
password:
hyperstream:23232> help

target.mrk: Windows

trans-unit.source: On the machine hosting the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />:

trans-unit.source: Select Start > Run and enter cmd in the Open field. In the bin directory of the HyperStream Installation directory, launch the ade_server command with the option you require.

seg-source.mrk: Select Start > Run and enter cmd in the Open field.
In the bin directory of the HyperStream Installation directory, launch the ade_server command with the option you require.

target.mrk: Sélectionnez Démarrez > Exécuter et saisissez cmd dans le champ.
Dans le répertoire bin du répertoire d’installation HyperStream, exécutez la commande ade_server avec l’option dont vous avez besoin.

trans-unit.source: Linux

seg-source.mrk: Linux

target.mrk: Linux

trans-unit.source: Launch the ./ade_server command with the option you require.

seg-source.mrk: Launch the ./ade_server command with the option you require.

target.mrk: Exécutez la commande ./ade_server avec l’option dont vous avez besoin.

trans-unit.source: You must stop the service prior to making any modifications through the ade_server interface. The service name is ADE.default unless you modified the default name when you installed the product.

seg-source.mrk: You must stop the service prior to making any modifications through the ade_server interface.
The service name is ADE.default unless you modified the default name when you installed the product.

target.mrk: Vous devez arrêter le service du avant toute modification avec la commande ade_server.
Le nom du service est ADE.default, sauf si vous l’avez modifié lors de l’installation.

trans-unit.source: Main Command Line Configuration Operations

seg-source.mrk: Main Command Line Configuration Operations

target.mrk: Principales opérations de configuration en ligne de commande

trans-unit.source: Do not delete any block files from the repository as they may be needed for restore operations.

seg-source.mrk: Do not delete any block files from the repository as they may be needed for restore operations.

target.mrk: Ne supprimez aucun fichier bloc du répertoire de stockage des données car il pourrait être nécessaire à une restauration.

trans-unit.source: <MadCap:annotation MadCap:createDate="2020-06-15T14:25:32.7956319+02:00" MadCap:creator="tychom" MadCap:initials="TY" MadCap:comment="Check this section with LCH" MadCap:editor="tychom" MadCap:editDate="2020-06-15T14:25:40.4141757+02:00" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Add or remove a Repository</MadCap:annotation>

mrk.bpt: <MadCap:annotation MadCap:createDate="2020-06-15T14:25:32.7956319+02:00" MadCap:creator="tychom" MadCap:initials="TY" MadCap:comment="Check this section with LCH" MadCap:editor="tychom" MadCap:editDate="2020-06-15T14:25:40.4141757+02:00" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">

seg-source.mrk: Add or remove a Repository

target.mrk: Ajouter ou supprimer un espace de stockage

trans-unit.source: A repository is primarily used for future block files. If you remove a repository that already contained block files, the data backed up remains in the repository unless you move the existing block files.Do not manually move the block files. Otherwise, <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> looses track of these files.

seg-source.mrk: A repository is primarily used for future block files.
If you remove a repository that already contained block files, the data backed up remains in the repository unless you move the existing block files.Do not manually move the block files.
Otherwise, <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> looses track of these files.

target.mrk: Un répertoire de stockage est principalement utilisé pour les futurs fichiers de bloc.

Si vous supprimez un répertoire de stockage dans lequel il y a déjà des fichiers blocs, ces données restent dans l’emplacement initial de stockage sauf si vous les déplacez. Ne déplacez-pas les fichiers de blocs manuellement.
Dans le cas contraire, le <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> perd la trace de ces blocs.

trans-unit.source: Adding or removing a repository can also be performed by modifying an environment variable in the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />. See <MadCap:xref href="../Documentation_Lina/Manage_Server_Parameters.htm#use_3944184059_1089569" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Managing Parameters</MadCap:xref> for details.

seg-source.mrk: Adding or removing a repository can also be performed by modifying an environment variable in the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

See <MadCap:xref href="../Documentation_Lina/Manage_Server_Parameters.htm#use_3944184059_1089569" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Managing Parameters</MadCap:xref> for details.

target.mrk: L’ajout et la suppression d’un répertoire de stockage peut également se faire dans la <MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

Voir <MadCap:xref href="../Documentation_Lina/Manage_Server_Parameters.htm#use_3944184059_1089569" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Managing Parameters</MadCap:xref> pour plus de détails.

trans-unit.source: Change the port for all <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> HyperStream drives in order to restore data from the clients. See <MadCap:xref href="HSS_Configuration_Tina.htm#hss_installation_814337163_1096377" target="_blank" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">To change drives port numbers</MadCap:xref>.

seg-source.mrk: Change the port for all <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> HyperStream drives in order to restore data from the clients.

See <MadCap:xref href="HSS_Configuration_Tina.htm#hss_installation_814337163_1096377" target="_blank" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">To change drives port numbers</MadCap:xref>.

target.mrk: changer le port pour tous les lecteurs <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> HyperStream afin de restaurer les données des clients.

Voir <MadCap:xref href="HSS_Configuration_Tina.htm#hss_installation_814337163_1096377" target="_blank" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">To change drives port numbers</MadCap:xref>.

trans-unit.source: If a server is replicated or mirrored onto another server, it is not possible to change the server port number. If you do, the replication will fail.

seg-source.mrk: If a server is replicated or mirrored onto another server, it is not possible to change the server port number.
If you do, the replication will fail.

target.mrk: Si un serveur est répliqué ou mis en miroir sur un autre serveur, il n'est pas possible de changer le numéro de port du serveur.
Si vous le faites, la réplication échouera.
